messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Roblox-looking for unschooled friends
messages.msgSnippet: Nic is loving having so many more roblox friends. We just created an account for Theo today and he d appreciate some friends as well: theo6 Thanks! Mary mama
messages.messageBody:
Nic is loving having so many more roblox friends.

We just created an account for Theo today and he'd appreciate some friends
as well:

theo6

Thanks!

Mary
mama to Nic, Theo & Whinnie
in the beautiful mountains of West Virginia

On Thu, Apr 15, 2010 at 1:49 PM, lalow66 <lalow@...> wrote:

>
>
> My two oldest boys absolutely love Roblox and my 8 year old recently made a
> comment about how his friends are not allowed to play there during school
> hours (they are mostly homeschooled but not allowed on the computer except
> weekends). I volunteered to see if I might be able to find some unschooling
> Roblox friends for him online. James' name is JandB2001 and Ben is BenJAMin
> 2003. If anyone's kids would like to send a friend request they would love
> it.
> When I suggested this yesterday, James was very shocked to find out there
> are other families that "dont do school, even at home".
> Thanks
>
>
>


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.messageBody:
Nic (nic44) says that he's sent and/or accepted friend requests from
everyone listed on this thread. If anyone else wishes to friend him he says
'the more the better!'

peace,
Mary

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Roblox-looking for unschooled friends
messages.msgSnippet: My boys LOVE roblox! I ll give them your boys usernames. Please tell them to look for Nic44. If anyone else wants to friend him there he d be thrilled. Theo
messages.messageBody:
My boys LOVE roblox!
I'll give them your boys' usernames. Please tell them to look for Nic44.

If anyone else wants to friend him there he'd be thrilled.

Theo doesn't yet have his own account as he and Nic are an
almost-inseparable computer team.

Thanks for reminding me. The boys have been loving Wizard 101 and
addictinggames.com and totally forgot to checkin at roblox for a long time
now. They squealed with glee when I asked them about it just now.

Suffice to say, they'll be on there as soon as they get out of the shower.

peace,
Mary
mama to Nic, Theo & Whinnie

messages.subject: Roblox-looking for unschooled friends
messages.msgSnippet: My two oldest boys absolutely love Roblox and  my 8 year old recently made a comment about how his friends are not allowed to play there during school hours
messages.messageBody:
My two oldest boys absolutely love Roblox and my 8 year old recently made a comment about how his friends are not allowed to play there during school hours (they are mostly homeschooled but not allowed on the computer except weekends). I volunteered to see if I might be able to find some unschooling Roblox friends for him online. James' name is JandB2001 and Ben is BenJAMin 2003. If anyone's kids would like to send a friend request they would love it.
When I suggested this yesterday, James was very shocked to find out there are other families that "dont do school, even at home".
Thanks
